Position We are currently hiring interns to join our IG Wealth Management AI Internship Program this summer (May-August) in our Toronto office. As part of this inaugural program, interns will work alongside Senior Leaders across IG to help embed AI-driven capabilities into real business strategies and initiatives. In a supportive and collaborative environment, interns are empowered with ownership over their work, gaining hands-on experience managing projects and presenting outcomes to senior stakeholders. If you're passionate about the financial services industry, bring strong technical skills, and enjoy problem-solving and innovation, this program offers a unique opportunity to make an impact while you learn. This opportunity is open to undergraduate students who will be returning to school after the internship. Intern placement will work within one of the following departments; Financial Planning, Sales & Distribution, Investment Solutions, Investment Strategy, Mortgage, Insurance & Banking, Strategy, Advisor & Client Experience, and Private Company Advisory. Responsibilities: • Work on real AI and automation projects that support business teams and leaders • Partner with cross?functional teams to explore how AI can improve processes, decisions, and client experience • Help break down business problems and turn ideas into AI use cases, workflows, or simple prototypes • Research new AI tools, trends, and use cases and share key insights with the team • Support data preparation and basic analysis to enable AI and analytics initiatives • Assist with testing, documentation, and improvement of AI tools or process enhancements • Create presentations and visuals to share progress and results with senior leaders • Participate in team meetings, workshops, and learning sessions focused on responsible and ethical AI Contribute ideas that improve efficiency and support continuous improvement • To apply, please include a resume and transcripts (full unofficial version) by February 15, 2026, at 11:59 pm EST.
